direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods validate IP addresses but for different IP versions (IPv4 vs. IPv6).
Both methods use regex matching to validate input strings.
Both methods validate IP addresses, but isValid checks both IPv4 and IPv6.
Both methods handle invalid input strings and return appropriate validation results.

Environment setup is required before validating IP addresses.
Both methods verify IP formats and handle similar exceptions.
